name: PARKROYAL Kuala Lumpur

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back after spending four nights at the Parkroyal and can't fault it at all. The room although not the biggest I've stayed in in K.L. was very comfortable and clean. I had read reviews about the breakfast and have to say there was something for everybody it was excellent. I have stayed at four different hotels in K.L. and the Parkroyal is up there with the best of them. Would certainly stay there again.
reviews.title: Great Hotel
Loved this Hotel - Great location comfortable room
reviews.text: Stayed here as part of the Kuoni tour of Malaysia. Wonderful hotel in an excellent area. 1 minute walk from monorail station. There are some great little drink stalls 20 yards to the right where you can get a great coconut for 60p. Kuala Lumper is a stunning city - China town is a must visit. Got a 'Rolex' Watch here for 50 ringetts (about 7 pounds) do not spend more than 75. Also an amazing leather briefcase for 65. Definately recommend this hotel clean, well linked to rest of city, breakfasts amazing and room very very comfortable with stunning views of the city.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for two nights and after staying in the Oriental Singapore, was extremely disappointed by the service and the room. I wanted to book a 5* hotel but apparently due to a conference in town there were none available and this was my best bet. The superior room was tiny and not really having a separate bathroom was a bit of a suprise. Having the sink in the middle of the room was a challenge. The hotel was central though which is about the only good thing I could say for it. They don't do room service breakfasts which was a disappointment as we then had to eat at the airport on our last day.
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were at the ParkRoyal from Nov 5-7 this year. We found the location for the hotel ideal. It is right across from Sungei Wang plaza and at Bukit Bintang sky train station. This makes it very easy to get to major attractions in KL.
reviews.title: Great location, clean rooms and wonderful breakfast

reviews.text: The service at the hotel was very good. Our room rates included breakfast. The variety of western and asian breakfast dishes available was really staggering. However, my favourite was the fruit selection and the fresh fruit juices.
reviews.title: Good hotel, not too pricey

reviews.text: Our room(superior room) was small but this was expected as most clientele are business folks who spend very little time at the hotel. We loved the marbled bathroom area as it gave the whole room a very sleek look.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: Definitely worth staying here if one does not wish to spend a lot of time in the room and requires a good clean place to stay. Load up on breakfast and you will be fine until dinner.
reviews.title: Couldn't have asked for any better

likes.liked: — The rooms could accommodate a family of four - two double beds

description: The 5-star hotel managed by Pan Pacific Hotels Group, is centrally located in the heart of Kuala Lumpur's prime business, shopping and entertainment districts. It is only 45 minutes from Kuala Lumpur International Airport and mere minutes from the Kuala Lumpur City Centre (KLCC).
